engine.type: turbocharged and intercooled DOHC 16-valve inline-4, aluminum block and head, direct fuel injection

weaknesses: loss of the six-speed manual transmission
lackadaisical responses to throttle inputs from the automatic transmission
choppier ride over rougher roads with larger 18-inch wheels
overallVerdict: The 2025 Volkswagen Jetta offers value with its affordable pricing, standard features, and spacious interior, but it faces tough competition from newer, more engaging models. Stick to the better-riding S and Sport trims for the best experience.
